Our most popular bag in five sizes!

Sub Header

I suggest you try it again, Luke. This time, let go your conscious self and act on instinct. The Force is strong with this one. I have you now. A tremor in the Force. The last time I felt it was in the presence of my old master. I want to come with you to Alderaan. There's nothing for me here now. I want to learn the ways of the Force and be a Jedi, like my father before me.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Embroidery options for up to 3 sides of the bag.
  • Foam padding throughout the inside and hard plastic on the outside to protect your equipment.
  • Commercial grade materials.
  • 8 zipper pockets for literature and product storage
  • Our Watts Baggs exclusive wheel system
  • Customizable interior with removable/adjustable divider system

Long boxes or equipment?

Carry it all with our piggy back options!
CPS/Scout Pro | Attain Delivery | Large Rapido | Small Piggyback
